title: Disney’s Literal Kingdom, Surviving The Unmasked Skies 4.25.22
itunes:title: Disney’s Literal Kingdom, Surviving The Unmasked Skies 4.25.22
description:
In episode 1233, Jack and Miles are joined by producer and comedian Jackie Keliiaa to discuss… Shit might get difficult for Kevin McCarthy?, Reducing Risk In a Mask Optional World, Florida Wants To Repeal Disney World’s (Creepy) Self-Governance and more!

  1. Reduce Risk In a Mask Optional World
  2. Florida Wants To Repeal Disney World’s (Creepy) Self-Governance
  3. Disney vows to help repeal ‘Don’t Say Gay’ law, says Florida Gov. DeSantis shouldn’t have signed it
  4. Right-Wing Writer Says Cancel Disney for Dollywood—Park Owned by LGBTQ Icon
  5. TED CRUZ WARNS DISNEY PROGRAMMING WILL SOON DEPICT MICKEY AND PLUTO F--KING
  6. Why Disney World Has Its Own Government
  7. Hidden Kingdom: Disney's Political Blueprint
  8. Union Says Reedy Creek Fire Department is Critically Understaffed, Fears Increased Risk for Walt Disney World Guests
  9. Reedy Creek firefighters say they need help responding to Disney World incidents
  10. Disney Chief Raps Orlando's Officials, Then Apologizes

FOLLOW: @jackiecomedy

Check Out: Good Medicine Native Comedy Show

LISTEN: Mouth by Ghost Culture

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
